GK19dandkc_u:2512: atikrāntaśāsanāśca prajā yatkiñcanavādinyo yatākathañcidvartinyaḥ sarvāḥ sthitīḥ saṃkireyuḥ nirmaryādaśca loko lokādito 'mutaśca svāminamātmānaṃ ca bhraṃśayeta /
GK19dandkc_u:2514: divyaṃ hi cakṣurbhūtabhavadbhaviṣyatsu vyavahitaviprakṛṣṭādiṣu ca viṣayeṣu śāstraṃ nāmāpratihatavṛtti
GK19dandkc_u:2521_0: tāṃ ca vārtāṃ pārthivena pramadāsaṃnidhau prasaṅgenodīritāmupaniśamya samīpopaviṣṭaścittānuvṛttikuśalaḥ prasādavitto gītanṛtyavādyādiṣvabāhmo
GK19dandkc_u:2521_1: bāhmanārīparāyaṇaḥ paṭurayantritamukho bahubhaṅgiviśāradaḥ paramarmānveṣaṇaparaḥ parihāsayitā parivādaruciḥ paiśunyapaṇḍhitaḥ
GK19dandkc_u:2521_2: sacivamaṇḍalādapyutkocahārī sakaladurnayopādhyāyaḥ kāmatantrakarṇadhāraḥ kumārasevako vihārabhadro nāma smitapūrvaṃ vyajñapayat-”deva,
GK19dandkc_u:2524: śiraḥ, baddhvā da--bhiḥ, ajinenācchādya, navanītenopalipya, anaśanaṃ ca śāyayitvā, sarvasvaṃ svīkariṣyanti /
GK19dandkc_u:2526: yadi kaścitpaṭujātīyo nāsyai mṛgatṛṣṇikāyai hastagataṃ tyaktumicchet /
GK19dandkc_u:2528: śastrādṛte sarvaśatrun ghātayem, ekaśarīriṇamapi martyaṃ cakravartinaṃ
GK19dandkc_u:2531: punarime bruvate-”nanu catasro rājavidyāstrayī vārtānvīkṣikī daṇḍanītiriti
GK19dandkc_u:2544: iyata odanasya pākāyetāvadindhanaṃ paryāptamiti mānonmānapūrvakaṃ deyam /
GK19dandkc_u:2545: utthitena ca rājñā kṣālitākṣālite mukhe muṣṭimardhamuṣṭiṃ vābhyantarīkṛtya kṛtsnamāyavyayajātamahnaḥ prathame 'ṣṭame vā bhāge śrotavyam /
GK19dandkc_u:2549: jīvatiḥ tatrāri prāḍvivākādayaḥ svecchayā jayaparaujayā vidadhānāḥ pāpenākīrtyā ca bhartāramātmanaścārthairyojayanti
GK19dandkc_u:2554_0: tatrāpi mantriṇo madhyasthā ivānyonyaṃ mithaḥ saṃbhūya doṣaguṇau dūtacārahavākyāni śakyāśakyatāṃ deśakālakāryāvasthāśca svecchayā
GK19dandkc_u:2555: bāhmābhyantarāṃśca kopān gūḍhamutpādya prakāśaṃ praśamayanta iva svāminamavaśamavagṛhṇanti
GK19dandkc_u:2560: punarupāsyaiva saṃdhyām, prathame rātribhāge gūḍhapuruṣā draṣṭavyāḥ /
GK19dandkc_u:2567: dūtāśca nāmobhayatra priyākhyānalabdhānarthānvītaśulkabādhavartmani vāṇijyayā vardhayantaḥ, kāryamavidyāmānamapi leśenotpādyānavarataṃ bhramanti /
GK19dandkc_u:2575: te cāmī kaṣṭadryā bahvapatyā yajvāno vīryavantaścādyāpyaprāptapratigrahāḥ
GK19dandkc_u:2576: dattaṃ caibhyaḥ svargyamāyuṣyamariṣṭanāśanaṃ ca bhavati' iti bahu bahu
GK19dandkc_u:2580: śāstrajñasamājñāto hi yaddadāti, yanmānayati, yatpriyaṃ bravīti,
GK19dandkc_u:2583_0: yāvatā ca nayena vinā na lokayātrā sa loka eva siddhaḥ nātra śāstreṇārthaḥ stanandhayo 'pi hi taistairupāyaiḥ stanapānaṃ
GK19dandkc_u:2583_1: jananyā lipsate tadapāsyātiyantraṇāmanubhūyantāṃ yatheṣṭamindriyasukhāni ya'pyupadiśanti “evamindriyāṇi jetavyāni, evamariṣaḍvargastyājyaḥ,
GK19dandkc_u:2585: saṃdhivigrahacintayaiva neyaḥ kālaḥ, svalpo 'pi sukhasyāvakāśo na deyaḥ'
GK19dandkc_u:2592: tairapi hi prārabdheṣu kāryeṣu dṛṣṭe siddhyasiddhī /
GK19dandkc_u:2594: nanvidamupapannaṃ devasya, yaduta sarvalokasya vandyā jātiḥ, ayātayāmaṃ
GK19dandkc_u:2596: tatsarvaṃ sarvāviśvāsahetunā sukhopabhogapratibandhinā bahumārgavikalpanātsarvakāryeṣvamuktasaṃśayena tantrāvāpena mā kṛthā vṛkṣā /
GK19dandkc_u:2597: santi hi te dantināṃ daśasahasrāṇi, hayānāṃ lakṣatrayam, anantaṃ ca pādātam /
GK19dandkc_u:2599: sarvaścaiṣa jīvalokaḥ samagramapi yugasahasraṃ bhuñjāno na te koṣṭhāgārāṇi recayiṣyati /
GK19dandkc_u:2605: kiṃ bahunā rājyabhāraṃ bhārakṣameṣvantaraṅgeṣu bhaktimatsu samarpya,
GK19dandkc_u:2606: apsaraḥpratirūpābhirantaḥpurikābhī ramamāṇo gītasaṃgītapānagoṣṭhīśca yathartu badhnanyathārhaṃ kuru śarīralābham' iti pañcāṅgīspṛṣṭabhūmirañjalicumbitacūḍaściramaśeta /
GK19dandkc_u:2610: athaiṣu dineṣu bhūyobhūyaḥ prastuter'the preryamāṇo mantrivṛddhena,
GK19dandkc_u:2616_0: na māṃ snigdhaṃ paśyati, na smitapūrvaṃ bhāṣate, na rahasyāni vivṛṇoti, na haste spṛśati, na vyasaneṣvanukampate, notsaveṣvanugṛhṇāti,
GK19dandkc_u:2616_1: na vilobhanavastu preṣayati, na matsukṛtāni pragaṇayati, na me ga-havārtāṃ
GK19dandkc_u:2621: maduktasyottaraṃ na dadāti, matsamānadoṣānvigarhati, marmaṇi māmupahasati,
GK19dandkc_u:2622: svamatamapi mayā varṇyamānaṃ pratikṣipati, mahārhāṇi vastūni matprahitāni
GK19dandkc_u:2625: dakṣiṇā apa tadbhāvabahiṣkṛtā dveṣyā bhaveyuḥ' iti /
GK19dandkc_u:2629: sarvathā nayajñasya vasantabhānoraśmakendrasya haste rājyamidaṃ patitam /
GK19dandkc_u:2634: evaṃ gate mantriṇi, rājani ca kāmavṛtte, candrapālito nāmāśvakendrāmātyasyendrapālitasya sūnuḥ, asadvṛttaḥ pitṛnirvāsito nāma
GK19dandkc_u:2654: uttamāṅganopabhoge 'pyarahthadharmayoḥ saphalīkaraṇam, phuṣkalaḥ puruṣābhimānaḥ bhāvajñānakauśalam, alobhakliṣṭamāceṣṭitam, akhilāsu kalāsu vaicakṣaṇyam,
GK19dandkc_u:2671: vākpāruṣyaṃ daṇḍo dāruṇo dūṣaṇāni cārthānāmeva yathāvakāśamaupakārikāṇi /
GK19dandkc_u:2672: nahi muniriva narapatirupaśamaratirabhibhavitumarikulamalam, abalambituṃ ca lokatantram' iti
GK19dandkc_u:2679: sāmantapaurajānapadamukhyāśca samānaśīlatayopārūḍhaviśrambheṇa rājñā sajānayaḥ pānagoṣṭhīṣvabhyantarīkṛtāḥ svaṃsvamācāramatyācāriṣuḥ /
GK19dandkc_u:2682: sarvaśca kulāṅganājanaḥ sulabhabhaṅgibhāṣaṇarato bhagnacāritrayantraṇastṛṇāyāpi na gaṇayitvā
GK19dandkc_u:2691_0: tadā ca mṛgayuveṣamṛgabāhulyavarṇanenādridroṇīranapasāramārgāḥ suṣkatṛṇavaṃśagulmāḥ praveśya dvārato 'gnivisargaiḥ, vyāghrādivadhe
GK19dandkc_u:2697: parākramaiḥ, parakalatreṣu suhṛttevanābhiyojya jārānbhartṝnumayaṃ vā prahṛtya tatsāhasopanyāsaiḥ, yogyanārīhāritānāṃ saṃketeṣu prāgupanilīya
GK19dandkc_u:2698: paścādabhidutyākīrtanīyaiḥ pramāpaṇaiḥ, upapralobhya bilapraveśeṣu nidhānakhananeṣu mantrasādhaneṣu ca vighnavyājasādhyairvyāpādanaiḥ,
GK19dandkc_u:2699: mattagajādhirohaṇāya preya pratyapāyanivartanaiḥ, vyālahastinaṃ koṣayitvā lakṣyīkṛtamukyamaṇḍaleṣvapakramaṇaiḥ,
GK19dandkc_u:2702: atha vasantabhānurbhānuvarmāṇaṃ nāma vānavāsyaṃ protsāhyānantavarmaṇā vyagrāhayat /
GK19dandkc_u:2707: tasmiṃścāvasare mahāsāmantasya kuntalapateravantidevasyātmanāṭakīyāṃ kṣmātalorvaśīṃ nāma candrapālitādibhiratipraśastanṛtyakauśalāmāhūyāntavarmā nṛtyamadrākṣīt /
GK19dandkc_u:2709: aśmakendrastu kuntalapatimekānte samabhyadhatta-”pramatta eṣa rājā kalatrāṇi naḥ parāmṛśati
GK19dandkc_u:2711: mama śatamasti hastinām, pañcaśatāni ca te /
GK19dandkc_u:2712: tadāvāṃ saṃbūya muraleśaṃ vīrasenamṛcīkeśamekavīraṃ koṅkaṇapatiṃ kumāraguptaṃ sāsikyanāthaṃ ca nāgapālamupajapāva /
GK19dandkc_u:2714: ayaṃ ca vānavāsyaḥ priyaṃ me mitram /
GK19dandkc_u:2718: kāñjanakuṅkumapalānām, prābhṛtīkṛtyāptamukhena taiḥ sāmantaiḥ saṃmantrya tānapi svamatāvasthāpayat
GK19dandkc_u:2719: uttaredyusteṣāṃ sāmantānāṃ vānavāsyasya ca anantavarmā nayadveṣādāmipatvamagamat /
GK19dandkc_u:2720: vasantabhānuśca tatkośavāhanamavaśīrṇamātmādhiṣṭitameva kṛtvā yathāprayāsaṃ yathābalaṃ ca vibhajya gṛhṇīta /
GK19dandkc_u:2725: asmiṃścāntera mantrivṛddho vasurakṣitaḥ kaiścinmaulaiḥ saṃbhūya bālamenaṃ
GK19dandkc_u:2726: bhāskaravarmāṇam, asyaiva jyāyasīṃ baginīṃ trayodaśavarṣāṃ mañjuvādinīm,
GK19dandkc_u:2727: anayośca mātaraṃ mahādevīṃ vasuṃdharāmādāyāpasarpannāpado 'syā bhāvitayā dāhajvareṇa dehamajahāt
GK19dandkc_u:2728: asmādṛśairmitraistu nītvā māhiṣmatīṃ bhartṛdvaimāturāya bhrātre mitravarmaṇe sāpatyā devī darśitābhūt /
GK19dandkc_u:2730: nirbhartsitaśca tayā “sutamiyamakhaṇḍacāritrā rājyarhiṃ cikīrṣati' iti nairghṛṇyāttamenaṃ bālamajighāṃsīt /
GK19dandkc_u:2731: idaṃ tu jñātvā devyāhamājñaptaḥ-”tāta, nālījaṅgaḥ, jīvatānenārbhakeṇa yatra kvacidavadhāya jīva /
GK19dandkc_u:2734: pādacāriṇaṃ cainamāśvāsayituṃ ghoṣe kvacidahāni kānicidviśramayya, tatrāpi rājapuruṣasaṃpātabhīto duradhvamapāsaram /
GK19dandkc_u:2739: “kimīyā jātyāsya mātā' ityanuyukte mayāmunoktam-”pāṭaliputrasya vaṇijo vaiśravaṇasya duhitari sāgaradattāyāṃ kosalendrātkusumadhanvano 'sya mātā
GK19dandkc_u:2745: pratiṣṭhāpayeyam' iti pratijñāya kathamasyaināṃ kṣudhaṃ kṣapayeyam'
GK19dandkc_u:2747: tāvadāpatitau ca kasyāpi vyādhasya trīnipūnatītya dvau mṛgau sa ca vyādhaḥ
GK19dandkc_u:2750: taṃ caikaṃ mṛgaṃ dattvā mṛgayave, anyasyāpalomatvacaḥ klomāpāhye,
GK19dandkc_u:2751: niṣkulākṛtya vikṛtyorvaṅghrigrīvādīni śūlākṛtya dāvāṅgāraṣuṣa taptenāmiṣeṇa tayorātmanaśca kṣudhamatārṣam /
GK19dandkc_u:2754: asāvācaṣṭa-” tatra vyāghratvaco dṛtaści vikrīyādaivāgataḥ kiṃ na jānāmi /
GK19dandkc_u:2755: pracaṇḍavarmā nāma caṇḍavarmānujo mitravarmaduhitaraṃ mañjuvādinīṃ vilipsurabhyetīti tenotsavottarā purī' iti /
GK19dandkc_u:2756: atha karṇe jīrṇamabravam-”dhūrto mitravarmā duhitari samyakpratipattyā
GK19dandkc_u:2757: mātaraṃ viśvāsya tanmukhena pratyākṛṣya bālakaṃ jighāṃsati /
GK19dandkc_u:2758: tatpratigatyaṃ kuśalamasya madvārtā ca devyai raho nivedya punaḥ kumāraḥ śārdūlabhakṣita iti prakāśamākrośanaṃ kāryam /
GK19dandkc_u:2760: punastayā tvanmukhena sa vācyaḥ-”yadapekṣayā tvanmatamatyakramiṣaṃ so 'pi
GK19dandkc_u:2764: punaranena vatsanābhanāmnā mahāviṣeṇa saṃnīya toyaṃ tatra mālāṃ majjayitvā tayā sa vakṣasi mukhe ca hantavyaḥ /
GK19dandkc_u:2766: punaranenāgadena saṃgamite 'mbhasi tāṃ mālāṃ majjayitvā svaduhitre deyā /
GK19dandkc_u:2767: mṛte tu tasmiṃstasyāṃ ca nirvikārāyāṃ satyām, satītyevaināṃ prakṛtayo 'nuvartiṣyante /
GK19dandkc_u:2770: tāvadāvāṃ kāpālikavepacchannau devyaiva dīyamānabhikṣau puro vahirupaśmaśānaṃ vatsyāvaḥ /
GK19dandkc_u:2772: devī-”svapne 'dya me devyā vindhyavāsinyā kṛtaḥ prasādaḥ /
GK19dandkc_u:2774: pañcame 'hani revātaṭavartini madbhavane parīkṣya vaijanyam, janeṣu nirgateṣu kapāṭamuddhāṭya tvatsutena saha ko 'pi dvijakumāro niryāsyati /
GK19dandkc_u:2776: sa khalu bālo mayā vyāghrīrūpayā tiraskṛtya sthāpitaḥ /
GK19dandkc_u:2777: sā ceyaṃ vatsā mañjuvādinī tasya dvijātidārakasya dāratvenaiva kalpitā' iti /
GK19dandkc_u:2779: tadetadatirahasyaṃ yuṣmāsveva guptaṃ tiṣṭhatu yāvadetadupapatsyate' iti /
GK19dandkc_u:2781: pratidiśaṃ ca lokavādaḥ prāsarpat-”aho māhātmyaṃ pativratānām /
GK19dandkc_u:2782: asiprahāra eva hi sa mālāprahārastasmai jātaḥ /
GK19dandkc_u:2784: yatastadeva dattaṃ dāma duhitre stanamaṇḍanameva tasyai jātaṃ na mṛtyuḥ /
GK19dandkc_u:2785: yo 'syāḥ pativratāyāḥ śāsanamativartate sa bhasmaiva bhavet' iti /
GK19dandkc_u:2786: atha mahāvrativeṣeṇa māṃ ca putraṃ ca bhikṣāyai praviṣṭau dṛṣṭvā prasnutastanī pratyutthāya harṣākulamabravīt-”bhagavan, ayamañjaliḥ anātho 'yaṃ jano 'nugṛhyatām /
GK19dandkc_u:2787: asati mamaikaḥ svapnaḥ sa kiṃ satyo na vā' ti /
GK19dandkc_u:2790: sa khalvasyāḥ sānāthyaśaṃsī svapnaḥ' iti maddarśanarāgabaddhasādhvasāṃ mañjuvādinīṃ praṇamayya, bhūyo 'pi sā harṣagarbhamabrūta-”taccenmithyā so
GK19dandkc_u:2791: 'yaṃ yuṣmadīyo bālakapālī śvo mayā niroddhavyaḥ' iti /
GK19dandkc_u:2793: labdhabhaikṣaḥ, nālījaṅghamākārya nirgamya tataśca taṃ cānuyāntaṃ śanairapṛccham-”kvāsāvalyāyuḥ prathitaḥ pracaṇḍavarmā' iti /
GK19dandkc_u:2799_1: mastyodvartanādīni ca karaṇāni, punarādāyādāyāsannavartināṃ kṣurikāḥ tābhirupāhitavarṣmā citraduṣkarāṇi karaṇāni śyenapātotkrośapātādīni
GK19dandkc_u:2800: darśayan, viṃśaticāpāntarālāvasthitasya pracaṇḍavarmaṇaśchurikayaikayā pratyurasaṃ prahṛtya, “jīvyādvarṣasahasraṃ vasantabhānuḥ' ityabhigarjan,
GK19dandkc_u:2802: pīvarāṃsabāhuśikharamākramya, tāvataiva taṃ vicetākurvan, sākulaṃ ca lokamuccakṣūkurvan, dvipuruṣocchritaṃ prākāramatyalaṅghayam /
GK19dandkc_u:2803: avaplutya copavane “madanupātināmeṣa panthā dṛśyate' iti bruvāṇa eva
GK19dandkc_u:2809: prāgeva tasmindurgāgṛhe prātimādhiṣṭhāna eva mayā kṛtaṃ bhagrapārśvasthairyasthūlaprastarasthagitabāhmadvāraṃ bilam /
GK19dandkc_u:2810: atha galati madhyarātre varṣavaropanītamahārharatnabhūṣaṇapaṭṭanivasanau tadbilamāvāṃ praviśya tūṣṇīmatiṣṭhāva /
GK19dandkc_u:2811: devī tu pūrvedyureva yathārhamagnisaṃskāraṃ mālavāya dattvā pracaṇḍavarmaṇe caṇḍavarmaṇe ca
GK19dandkc_u:2813: sahābhyatya bhagavatīmarcayitvā samarcanapratyakṣaṃ parīkṣitakukṣivaijanyaṃ tadbhavanaṃ pidhāya dattadṛṣṭiḥ saha janena
GK19dandkc_u:2815: aṇutararandhrapraviṣṭena tena nādenāhaṃ dattasaṃjñaḥ śirasaivotkṣipya sapratimaṃ lohapādapīṭhamaṃsalapuruṣaprayatnaduścalamubhayakaravidhṛtamekapāśvramekato niveśya niragamam /
GK19dandkc_u:2820: yuṣmānājñāpayati-mayā sakṛṣayā śārdūlarūpaiṇa tiraskṛtyādya vo dattamenamadyaprabhṛti matputratayā mandamātṛpakṣa iti parigṛhṇantu
GK19dandkc_u:2829: alabdharandhraśca loko naṣṭamuṣṭicintādikathanairabhyupāyāntaraprayuktairdvivyāṃśatāmeva mama samarthayamānaḥ, madājñāṃ nātyavartata /
GK19dandkc_u:2831: taṃ ca guṇavatyahani bhadrākṛtamupanāyya purohitena pāṭhayannītiṃ rājakāryāṇyanvatiṣṭham /
GK19dandkc_u:2832: acintayaṃ ca-”rājyaṃ nāma śaktitrayāyattama, śaktayaśca mantraprabhāvotsāhāḥ parasparānugṛhītāḥ kṛtyeṣu kramante /
GK19dandkc_u:2833: mantreṇa hi viniścayor'thānām, prabhāveṇa prārambhaḥ, utsāhena nirvahaṇam /
GK19dandkc_u:2838: yastvayamāryaketurnāma mitravarmamantrī sa kosalābhijanatvātkumāramātṛpakṣo mantriguṇaiśca yuktaḥ tanmatimavamatyaiva dhvasto mitravarmā, sa cellabdhaḥ peśalam' iti /
GK19dandkc_u:2840: māyāpuruṣo ya imāṃ rājyalakṣmīmanubhavati, sa cāyamasmadbālo bhujaṅgenāmunā parigṛhītaḥ
GK19dandkc_u:2843: so 'nyadaivaṃ māmāvedayat-”muhurupāsya prābhṛtaiḥ pravartya citrāḥ kathāḥ,
GK19dandkc_u:2844: saṃvāhya pāṇipādam, ati visrambhadattakṣaṇaṃ tamaprākṣaṃ tvadupadiṣṭena nayena /
